BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_REVENUE_GEN_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_REV_GEN_CAT_ID, NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_REV_NUMBER, DT_CONSTRUCTION_DATE, STR_REV_GEN_SERVICE_NAME, NUM_AREA_SQ_MT, STR_LOCATION, NUM_SERVICE_RENT, NUM_SER_ELEC_AMT, NUM_SER_WATER_AMT, NUM_SER_WATER_PEN_AMT, NUM_SER_RENT_PEN_AMT, NUM_SER_ELEC_PEN_AMT, STR_UNIT, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO EST_REV_GEN_SER_ITEM_MAP (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID, STR_ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, NUM_ITEM_ID, STR_ITEM_NAME, DT_DATE_OF_INSTALLATION, DT_DATE_OF_REMOVAL, STR_DESCRIPTION, GDT_EFFECT_FRM, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_REVENUE_GEN_MST SET DT_CONSTRUCTION_DATE=?,STR_REV_GEN_SERVICE_NAME=?,NUM_AREA_SQ_MT=?,STR_LOCATION=?,NUM_SERVICE_RENT=?,NUM_SER_ELEC_AMT=?,NUM_SER_WATER_AMT=?,NUM_SER_WATER_PEN_AMT=?,NUM_SER_RENT_PEN_AMT=?,NUM_SER_ELEC_PEN_AMT=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=? WHERE NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_REVENUE_GEN_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_REV_GEN_SER_ITEM_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM EST_REV_GEN_SER_ITEM_MAP A WHERE NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_REVENUE_GEN_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.GNUM_SLNO=? and NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID=?

UPDATE EST_REVENUE_GEN_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
